meanings.definition: reissuers: those who issue something again
meanings.sent1: The reissuers of the magazine made sure to update the content for the new edition.
meanings.sent2: The reissuers of the tickets had to reprint them due to a mistake in the original batch.
meanings.sent3: The reissuers of the invitations accidentally sent out double the amount needed for the party.
meanings.sent4: The reissuers of the currency notes were meticulous in ensuring the security features were intact.
meanings.sent5: The reissuers of the certificates included a special hologram for authenticity.

meanings.definition: reissuers: the act of issuing something again
meanings.sent1: The reissuers of the report had to make corrections before sending it out again.
meanings.sent2: The reissuers of the statement clarified the errors from the initial release.
meanings.sent3: The reissuers of the newsletter accidentally included old news in the updated version.
meanings.sent4: The reissuers of the permits faced a delay in the reissuing process.
meanings.sent5: The reissuers of the documents ensured that all changes were highlighted for easy reference.
